column4: hi all.  I added a graphics card and on the first boot I got a configuration screen I had never seen before.  Anyway, I selected what I thought was the right graphics card.  However, I could only get 800 x 600 resolution once I logged in.  Is there a way to "reset" the card I chose?  How do I get back to that configuration screen?
you need to enable the driver in restricted manager
I did use the proprietary driver. and it "seems" to work although it kicks me out of full screen when playing netpanzer once in a while.
so i dont understand what you problemis then?
